message.name: PLANCK_STATEINFO
message.field: System ID
Component ID
Timestamp (micros since boot or Unix epoch)
Current flight mode
Flight status: bit0:armed, bit1:in_flight, bit2:failsafe
Roll angle (rad, -pi..+pi)
Pitch angle (rad, -pi..+pi)
Yaw angle (rad, -pi..+pi)
X acceleration (raw)
Y acceleration (raw)
Z acceleration (raw)
Latitude
Longitude
Altitude, expressed as * 1000 (millimeters), AMSL (not WGS84 - note that virtually all GPS modules provide the AMSL as well)
Altitude above ground in meters, expressed as * 1000 (millimeters)
GPS velocity in m/s in NORTH direction in earth-fixed NED frame
GPS velocity in m/s in EAST direction in earth-fixed NED frame
GPS velocity in m/s in DOWN direction in earth-fixed NED frame

Z velocity of the tag relative to the CG of the aircraft in the NED frame

Euler angle pitch of the tag in NED frame
Euler angle yaw of the tag in NED frame
